attributes.action: stop giving new identities upon release from prison to dangerous criminals namely child torturers/murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask the Prime Minister to recognise the Human Rights of the Law abiding Citizens of this country and not just the criminal fraternity.  These sorts of ciminals should be incarcerated for life for their crimes, without consideration of their Human Rights which in my opinion they forfeited by perpetrating such a heinous crimes.  If they are released We, the Law abiding members of society have a right to know where and who they are so that we can benefit from our Human Right to know that we and our loved ones are safe.  Their Human rights were served by the fact that they were not put to death by this forgiving society for their crimes.  Lets protect the innocent not the guilty'

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
